    • 方法详细资料

      • startFlashing

        public void startFlashing(Context context,
                 boolean forever,
                 FontAwesomeText.AnimationSpeed speed)
        Used to start flashing a FontAwesomeText item
        参数:
        context - the current applications context
        forever - whether the item should flash repeatedly or just once
        speed - how fast the item should flash, chose between FontAwesomeText.AnimationSpeed.SLOW / FontAwesomeText.AnimationSpeed.MEDIUM / FontAwesomeText.AnimationSpeed.FAST

      • startRotate

        public void startRotate(Context context,
               boolean clockwise,
               FontAwesomeText.AnimationSpeed speed)
        Used to start rotating a FontAwesomeText item
        参数:
        context - the current applications context
        clockwise - true for clockwise, false for anti clockwise spinning
        speed - how fast the item should flash, chose between FontAwesomeText.AnimationSpeed.SLOW / FontAwesomeText.AnimationSpeed.MEDIUM / FontAwesomeText.AnimationSpeed.FAST

      • stopAnimation

        public void stopAnimation()
        Used to stop animating any FontAwesomeText item

      • setIcon

        public void setIcon(java.lang.String faIcon)
        Used to set the icon for a FontAwesomeText item
        参数:
        faIcon - - String value for the icon as per http://fortawesome.github.io/Font-Awesome/cheatsheet/

      • setTextColor

        public void setTextColor(int color)
        Used to set the text color of the underlying text view.
        参数:
        color - - Integer value representing a color resource.

      • setTextSize

        public void setTextSize(int unit,
               float size)
        Used to set the text size of the underlying text view.
        参数:
        unit - - Integer value representing a unit size
        size - - Float value representing text size

      • setTextSize

        public void setTextSize(float size)
